name: Crypto Market Report
prompt: Analyze the latest cryptocurrency market trends, focusing on major coins including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and emerging altcoins. Include market capitalization changes, trading volumes, and significant price movements.

name: AI Industry Report
prompt: Provide a comprehensive analysis of the artificial intelligence industry, covering latest developments in machine learning, generative AI, and industry applications. Focus on major players like OpenAI, Google, and emerging startups.

name: Global Stock Market Report
prompt: Analyze global stock market performance including S&P 500, NASDAQ, FTSE, and emerging markets. Cover major market movers, sector rotations, and economic indicators affecting equity markets.

name: Technology Sector Analysis
prompt: Evaluate the technology sector performance, focusing on FAANG stocks, semiconductor companies, and cloud computing providers. Include revenue trends, market share analysis, and future growth prospects.

name: Global Economic Outlook
prompt: Provide analysis of global economic conditions including GDP growth, inflation rates, central bank policies, and geopolitical impacts on international trade and investment flows.

name: Energy Market Report
prompt: Analyze energy markets including oil, natural gas, renewable energy sectors. Cover price trends, supply-demand dynamics, and transition to clean energy initiatives globally.
